name: Didyouknow😂FunnyFunFactFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From Volley FM for Alexa, Your Personalized Morning Radio 

"Alexa, Open Volley FM"

Did You Know brings you a new fun fact every day. Did you know otters hold hands when they sleep or that the fortune cookie was invented in California? Perfect for stocking your funny fact bank for that watercooler chat at the office.

Hosted by Sebastian & Peter.

FEEDBACK
Email me at riyadh@volleythat.com if you have any issues or feedback. I'd love to hear from you!

This flash briefing Alexa skill works great on:
Alexa Echo App
Alexa app for Kindle Fire
Amazon Echo Show (all)
Amazon Echo Spot
Amazon Echo (all) 
Amazon Echo Dot (all)
Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (all)
Amazon Fire Tablets (all)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
